Description: Current for Halt.This value is only limited by the minimum/maximum value range (no limitation of this valueby motor/power stage).In the case of a Halt, the current limit (_Imax_act)is one of the following values (whichever islowest):- LIM_I_maxHalt- _M_I_max- _PS_I_maxFurther current limitations caused by I2tmonitoring are also taken into account during aHalt.Default: _PS_I_max at 8 kHz PWM frequency and230/480 V mains voltageIn increments of 0.01 Arms.Modified settings become active immediately.
Parameter address via fieldbus: CANopen 3011:EhModbus 4380Profibus 4380CIP 117.1.14ModbusTCP 4380EtherCAT 3011:EhPROFINET 4380
